content.raw:
I see some funny inertias in the head and over the shoulders.

![atlas_v4_inertias.jpg](http://gsyc.es/~caguero/atlas_v4_inertias.jpg)
content.html: I see some funny inertias in the head and over the shoulders.

content.raw: I've made a few style changes in b9405ed. Feel free to merge it if it looks good.
content.html: I've made a few style changes in b9405ed. Feel free to merge it if it looks good.

content.raw:
for now atlas_v3 should behave similar to atlas_v3 in terms of the controllers we have for it.
BDI is debugging AtlasSimInterface with this branch.
content.html: for now atlas_v3 should behave similar to atlas_v3 in terms of the controllers we have for it. BDI is debugging AtlasSimInterface with this branch.

content.raw: John, any hint about how to black box testing this PR? Should I install the real BDI controller? What should I expect when running atlas_v4.launch?
content.html: John, any hint about how to black box testing this PR? Should I install the real BDI controller? What should I expect when running atlas_v4.launch?
